body_html:
I guess this is a float precision problem.
Because you name the file "new.mat", I suppose it is dumped by MATLAB and is of 64-bit precision.
While you load it, you may convert it to 32-bit precision, thus you get an approximation.

Actually, you can verify this with the C programming language:

#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
using namespace std;

int main() {
double x = 0.081345705;
float y = (float) x;
cout << setprecision(8) << x << " " << y << endl;
}

You will see that x=0.081345705 and y=0.081345707.
